item.description:
The Gourmet Brunch is the perfect place to a mid-morning Meetup!

They have over 100 omelet combinations to choose from. In addition to omelets, they have brunch specialties like Belgian Waffles, Eggs Benedict and Champagne drinks as well as many other tasty favorites!

There's no set price. Ordering is Ala Cart! Every woman is responsible for their own tab. Bring your appetite!

You can either park on Main Street or across the street in the parking lot for your convenience.


The Original Gourmet Brunch
517 Main Street, Downtown Hyannis
phone (508) 771-2558 Â· fax (508) 778-6052
email gourmetbrunch@msn.com

Open Year Round
Daily 7:00 a.m. to mid-day
Sundays 'til 2:00 p.m. or everyone is served
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be Wearing My Infamous Pink Hat!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: "Brunch" at the Gourmet Brunch in Hyannis
